decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | Dustbin and enclosed refuse areas, details of which shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority, shall be sited a maximum distance of 23 metres (10 metres where paladins are employed) from an adopted highway, and a maximum of 25 metres from any dwelling unit intended to use them..  REASON:	To comply with the Council's Design Guides, in accordance with Adopted Policies OL16, B2 and B5 and Draft Deposit Policies. | The play area hereby permitted shall not be used except within hours 0.800 to 20.00 Mondays to Sundays outside of which hours the play area shall be kept locked.  In accordance with Adopted Policy B5 and Draft Deposit Policy 3.5.
description: Remove three parking bays to provide an enlarged basketball and football pitch on existing abandoned play area and two parking bays to provide a new refuse bin stores area
